summary: Completed frontend testing of admin editing functionality for Menu, Locations, and Location Detail pages. All tested features are working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Admin bar correctly appears on MenuPage, LocationsPage, and LocationDetailPage when logged in as admin
Menu images are displaying correctly for Starters, Entrees, Seafood & Grits, Sandwiches, Salads, and Brunch categories
Edit mode on Menu page shows edit indicators (pencil icons) on items and allows clicking to edit
Edit mode on Locations page shows 'Click to Edit' overlay on location cards
Location Detail page has inline edit panel with form fields for Name, Address, Phone, etc.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin editing features tested. Location slugs are: edgewood-atlanta, midtown-atlanta, douglasville, riverdale, valdosta, albany, stone-mountain, las-vegas. Menu images are stored in database with image_url field.

Menu Page - Images for Starters.details: F&F Signature Wings, Chicken Thigh Nuggets, Fin's Tacos, Catfish Nuggets - all display images correctly

Menu Page - Images for Entrees.details: New Zealand Lamb Chops, Marinated Malibu Ribeye, Deep Fried Catfish - all display images

Menu Page - Images for Seafood & Grits.details: Catfish & Grits, Shrimp & Grits, Salmon & Grits - all display images

Menu Page - Images for Sandwiches.details: F&F Jerk Turkey Burger, Fire Chicken Sandwich, BBQ Chicken Sandwich, Catfish Filet Sandwich

Menu Page - Images for Salads.details: Chef Salad, Caesar Salad display images. Side items show as line items (expected behavior)

Menu Page - Images for Brunch.details: Chicken & Waffle, Breakfast Burrito, Edgewood Breakfast, All Star Breakfast

Menu Page - Admin Bar when logged in.details: Shows 'Admin Mode - Menu Editor' with Edit Menu button, Dashboard, Logout

Menu Page - Edit Mode.details: Edit mode shows Add Item and Done Editing buttons. Menu items show edit pencil indicators

Locations Page - Admin Bar when logged i.details: Shows 'Admin Mode - Location Editor' with Edit Locations button

Locations Page - Edit Mode.details: Edit mode shows Add Location and Done Editing buttons. Location cards have 'Click to Edit' overlay

Location Detail Page - Admin Bar when lo.details: Shows 'Admin Mode - Location: [Name]' with Edit Location button

Location Detail Page - Edit Mode.details: Shows 'Edit Location Details' panel with form fields: Name, Address, Phone, Reservation Phone, Online Ordering URL, Image URL. Save Changes and Cancel buttons visible
